com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka

Class KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the messages the KafkaConsumer will process.
    Enclosing class:
    KafkaConsumerFactory

    public class KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder<T>
extends Object
    A Builder for building a configured KafkaConsumer.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public KafkaConsumer build(KafkaConsumerConfiguration configuration)
        Builds a KafkaConsumer instance from the given KafkaConsumerConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the KafkaConsumerConfiguration to configure the KafkaConsumer with.
        Returns:
        a managed and configured KafkaConsumer.

      • build

        public KafkaConsumer build(KafkaConsumerConfiguration configuration,
                  String name)
        Builds a KafkaConsumer instance from the given KafkaConsumerConfiguration, ExecutorService and name.

        The name is used to identify the returned KafkaConsumer instance, for example, as the name of its HealthChecks, thread pool, etc.

        This implementation creates a new ExecutorService with a fixed-size thread-pool, configured for one thread per-partition the KafkaConsumer is being configured to consume.

        Parameters:
        configuration - the KafkaConsumerConfiguration to configure the KafkaConsumer with.
        name - the name of the KafkaConsumer.
        Returns:
        a managed and configured KafkaConsumer.

      • build

        public KafkaConsumer build(KafkaConsumerConfiguration configuration,
                  ExecutorService executor,
                  String name)
        Builds a KafkaConsumer instance from the given KafkaConsumerConfiguration, ExecutorService and name.

        The name is used to identify the returned KafkaConsumer instance, for example, as the name of its HealthChecks, etc.

        Parameters:
        configuration - the KafkaConsumerConfiguration to configure the KafkaConsumer with.
        executor - the ExecutorService to process messages with.
        name - the name of the KafkaConsumer.
        Returns:
        a managed and configured KafkaConsumer.
